TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WindowsPrincipal extends System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal

summary.span: 可讓程式碼檢查 Windows 使用者的 Windows 群組成員資格。

span.span: Enables code to check the Windows group membership of a Windows user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別主要用來檢查 Windows 使用者的角色。The class is primarily used to check the role of a Windows user. 方法多載可讓您使用不同的角色內容來檢查使用者角色。The method overloads let you check the user role by using different role contexts. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法多載。The following example demonstrates how to use the method overloads. 列舉型別，會識別內建角色相對識別碼 (Rid) 做為來源。The enumeration is used as the source for the relative identifiers (RIDs) that identify the built-in roles. Rid 用來判斷目前主體的角色。The RIDs are used to determine the roles of the current principal. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 判斷目前的主體是否屬於指定的 Windows 使用者群組。

span.span: Determines whether the current principal belongs to a specified Windows user group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有四個多載，這個方法。There are four overloads for this method. 基於效能考量，強烈建議多載。For performance reasons, the overload is strongly recommended. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不支援方法。The method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsInRole(int32 rid) cil managed
Public Overridable Function IsInRole (rid As Integer) As Boolean

param.name: rid
param.span: Windows 使用者群組的 RID 是用來檢查主體的成員狀態。

span.span: The RID of the Windows user group in which to check for the principal's membership status.

summary.span: 判斷目前的主體是否屬於具有指定相關識別元 (RID) 的 Windows 使用者群組。

span.span: Determines whether the current principal belongs to the Windows user group with the specified relative identifier (RID).

returns.span: 如果目前主體是指定之 Windows 使用者群組的成員 (也就是，有特定角色)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current principal is a member of the specified Windows user group, that is, in a particular role; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在測試新建立的角色資訊，例如新的使用者或新的群組，務必登出再登入強制執行的網域內的角色資訊傳播。When testing for newly created role information, such as a new user or a new group, it is important to log out and log in to force the propagation of role information within the domain. 沒有這麼做的話可能會造成測試，以傳回`false`。Not doing so can cause the test to return `false`. 在 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不支援這個方法。This method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition. 基於效能考量，多載偏好的多載，來判斷使用者的角色所建議。For performance reasons, the overload is recommended as the preferable overload for determining the user's role. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 當您嘗試執行需要系統管理權限的工作時，您就可以使用 [同意] 對話方塊中，動態提高您的角色。When you attempt to perform a task that requires administrative privileges, you can dynamically elevate your role by using the Consent dialog box. 執行的程式碼方法不會顯示同意對話方塊。The code that executes the method does not display the Consent dialog box. 即使您是內建的 Administrators 群組中，程式碼會傳回 false，如果您是在標準使用者角色。The code returns false if you are in the standard user role, even if you are in the Built-in Administrators group. 您執行的應用程式圖示上按一下滑鼠右鍵，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行的程式碼之前，您可以提高您的權限。You can elevate your privileges before you execute the code by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 相對識別碼 (Rid) 是 Windows 使用者群組的安全性識別碼 (SID) 的元件，並且支援來協助防止跨平台的當地語系化問題。Relative identifiers (RIDs) are components of a Windows user group's security identifier (SID) and are supported to help prevent cross-platform localization issues. 許多使用者帳戶、 本機群組和全域群組會有跨所有 Windows 版本保持不變的預設 RID 值。Many user accounts, local groups, and global groups have a default RID value that is constant across all versions of Windows. 比方說，BUILTIN\Administrators 角色 RID 是 0x220。For example, the RID for the BUILTIN\Administrators role is 0x220. 做為輸入參數使用 0x220方法會產生`true`會傳回目前的主體是否為系統管理員。Using 0x220 as the input parameter for the method results in `true` being returned if the current principal is an administrator. 下表列出預設 RID 值。The following tables list the default RID values. |內建的使用者Built-in users|RIDRID| |---------------------|---------| |DOMAINNAME\AdministratorDOMAINNAME\Administrator|0x1F40x1F4| |DOMAINNAME\GuestDOMAINNAME\Guest|0x1F50x1F5| |內建的全域群組Built-in global groups|RIDRID| |-----------------------------|---------| |DOMAINNAME\Domain AdminsDOMAINNAME\Domain Admins|0x2000x200| |DOMAINNAME\Domain 使用者DOMAINNAME\Domain Users|0x2010x201| |DOMAINNAME\Domain 來賓DOMAINNAME\Domain Guests|0x2020x202| |內建的本機群組Built-in local groups|RIDRID| |----------------------------|---------| |BUILTIN\AdministratorsBUILTIN\Administrators|0x2200x220| |BUILTIN\UsersBUILTIN\Users|0x2210x221| |BUILTIN\GuestsBUILTIN\Guests|0x2220x222| |BUILTIN\Account 運算子BUILTIN\Account Operators|0x2240x224| |BUILTIN\Server 運算子BUILTIN\Server Operators|0x2250x225| |BUILTIN\Print 運算子BUILTIN\Print Operators|0x2260x226| |BUILTIN\Backup 運算子BUILTIN\Backup Operators|0x2270x227| |BUILTIN\ReplicatorBUILTIN\Replicator|0x2280x228| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the methods. 列舉適用於做為來源識別內建角色的 Rid。The enumeration is used as the source for the RIDs that identify the built-in roles. Rid 用來判斷目前主體的角色。The RIDs are used to determine the roles of the current principal. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Determines whether the current principal belongs to the Windows user group with the specified security identifier (SID).

returns.span: 如果目前的主體是指定 Windows 使用者群組的成員，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current principal is a member of the specified Windows user group; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯一識別使用者或群組，在 Windows 2000，Windows Server 和 Windows XP 的實作。The uniquely identifies a user or group on Windows 2000, Windows Server, and Windows XP implementations. 在測試新建立的角色資訊，例如新的使用者或新的群組，務必登出再登入強制執行的網域內的角色資訊傳播。When testing for newly created role information, such as a new user or a new group, it is important to log out and log in to force the propagation of role information within the domain. 沒有這麼做的話可能會造成測試，以傳回`false`。Not doing so can cause the test to return `false`. 在 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不支援這個方法。This method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 當您嘗試執行需要系統管理權限的工作時，您就可以使用 [同意] 對話方塊中，動態提高您的角色。When you attempt to perform a task that requires administrative privileges, you can dynamically elevate your role by using the Consent dialog box. 執行的程式碼方法不會顯示同意對話方塊。The code that executes the method does not display the Consent dialog box. 即使您是內建的 Administrators 群組中，程式碼會傳回 false，如果您是在標準使用者角色。The code returns false if you are in the standard user role, even if you are in the Built-in Administrators group. 您執行的應用程式圖示上按一下滑鼠右鍵，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行的程式碼之前，您可以提高您的權限。You can elevate your privileges before you execute the code by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 基於效能考量，這是偏好的多載，來判斷使用者的角色。For performance reasons, this is the preferable overload to determine a user's role. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 列舉值用來判斷目前的主體是否為系統管理員。The enumeration value is used to determine whether the current principal is an administrator. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱方法。For the full code example, see the method. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/VB/source.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在測試新建立的角色資訊，例如新的使用者或新的群組，務必登出再登入強制執行的網域內的角色資訊傳播。When testing for newly created role information, such as a new user or a new group, it is important to log out and log in to force the propagation of role information within the domain. 沒有這麼做的話可能會造成測試，以傳回`false`。Not doing so can cause the test to return `false`. 在 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不支援這個方法。This method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition. 基於效能考量，多載偏好的多載，來判斷使用者的角色所建議。For performance reasons, the overload is recommended as the preferable overload for determining the user's role. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 當您嘗試執行需要系統管理權限的工作時，您就可以使用 [同意] 對話方塊中，動態提高您的角色。When you attempt to perform a task that requires administrative privileges, you can dynamically elevate your role by using the Consent dialog box. 執行的程式碼方法不會顯示同意對話方塊。The code that executes the method does not display the Consent dialog box. 即使您是內建的 Administrators 群組中，程式碼會傳回 false，如果您是在標準使用者角色。The code returns false if you are in the standard user role, even if you are in the Built-in Administrators group. 您執行的應用程式圖示上按一下滑鼠右鍵，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行的程式碼之前，您可以提高您的權限。You can elevate your privileges before you execute the code by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列範例會使用列舉型別用來判斷目前的主體是否為。The following example uses the enumeration is used to determine whether the current principal is an . 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱方法。For the full code example, see the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在測試新建立的角色資訊，例如新的使用者或新的群組，務必登出再登入強制執行的網域內的角色資訊傳播。When testing for newly created role information, such as a new user or a new group, it is important to log out and log in to force the propagation of role information within the domain. 沒有這麼做的話可能會造成測試，以傳回`false`。Not doing so can cause the test to return `false`. 在 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不支援這個方法。This method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition. 基於效能考量，多載偏好的多載，來判斷使用者的角色所建議。For performance reasons, the overload is recommended as the preferable overload for determining the user's role. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 當您嘗試執行需要系統管理權限的工作時，您就可以使用 [同意] 對話方塊中，動態提高您的角色。When you attempt to perform a task that requires administrative privileges, you can dynamically elevate your role by using the Consent dialog box. 執行的程式碼方法不會顯示同意對話方塊。The code that executes the method does not display the Consent dialog box. 即使您是內建的 Administrators 群組中，程式碼會傳回 false，如果您是在標準使用者角色。The code returns false if you are in the standard user role, even if you are in the Built-in Administrators group. 您執行的應用程式圖示上按一下滑鼠右鍵，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行的程式碼之前，您可以提高您的權限。You can elevate your privileges before you execute the code by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 針對內建角色，`role`字串的格式應該是 「 內建\\*RoleNameHere*"。For built-in roles, the `role` string should be in the form "BUILTIN\\*RoleNameHere*". 例如，若要測試 Windows 系統管理員角色的成員資格，代表角色的字串應該是"BUILTIN\Administrators"。For example, to test for membership in the Windows administrator role, the string representing the role should be "BUILTIN\Administrators". 請注意，可能需要逸出反斜線。Note that the backslash might need to be escaped. 下表列出的內建的角色。The following table lists the built-in roles. > [!NOTE] > 字串格式的內建角色的拼字不同於使用中的拼字列舉型別。The spelling for the BUILTIN roles in string format differs from the spelling used in the enumeration. 例如，列舉中的系統管理員的拼字是 「 系統管理員 」 不是"Administrators"。For example, the spelling for an administrator in the enumeration is "Administrator", not "Administrators". 這個多載時，請使用拼字檢查下表中的角色。When using this overload, use the spelling for the role from the following table. |內建的本機群組Built-in local groups| |----------------------------| |BUILTIN\AdministratorsBUILTIN\Administrators| |BUILTIN\UsersBUILTIN\Users| |BUILTIN\GuestsBUILTIN\Guests| |BUILTIN\Account 運算子BUILTIN\Account Operators| |BUILTIN\Server 運算子BUILTIN\Server Operators| |BUILTIN\Print 運算子BUILTIN\Print Operators| |BUILTIN\Backup 運算子BUILTIN\Backup Operators| |BUILTIN\ReplicatorBUILTIN\Replicator| 特定電腦角色`role`字串的格式應該是"MachineName\\*RoleNameHere*"。For machine-specific roles, the `role` string should be in the form "MachineName\\*RoleNameHere*". 定義域專屬角色`role`字串的格式應該是"DomainName\\*RoleNameHere*"; 例如， `"SomeDomain\Domain Users`"。For domain-specific roles, the `role` string should be in the form "DomainName\\*RoleNameHere*"; for example, `"SomeDomain\Domain Users`". > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 版，`role`參數會區分大小寫。In the .NET Framework version 1.0, the `role` parameter is case-sensitive. 在.NET Framework 1.1 版及更新版本，`role`參數不區分大小寫。In the .NET Framework version 1.1 and later, the `role` parameter is case-insensitive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 字串`BUILTIN\Administrators`和`BUILTIN\Users`用來判斷目前的主體是否為系統管理員或使用者。The strings `BUILTIN\Administrators` and `BUILTIN\Users` are used to determine whether the current principal is an administrator or a user. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱方法。For the full code example, see the method.
